PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1995-01301995-01-310,  ,  ,  ,  FIN,  ISTC,  ACOA,  WED-OLD,  ,  , 
PrecisAmendments to the SMALL BUSINESS LOANS REGULATIONS, 1993 which provide for the renewal or conversion of fixed-rate loans, redefine the limits on personal guarantees, impose conditions or restrictions on the sale or leasing of lands, modify the ranking system for the securing of assets, clarify the method for determining interest, establish criteria for the release of security, and clarify the rules affecting the transfer of loans.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1995-0081 Publication Date: 1995-02-22
Attachments
precis:
Amendments to the SMALL BUSINESS LOANS REGULATIONS, 1993 which provide for
the renewal or conversion of fixed-rate loans, redefine the limits on
personal guarantees, impose conditions or restrictions on the sale or
leasing of lands, modify the ranking system for the securing of assets,
clarify the method for determining interest, establish criteria for the
release of security, and clarify the rules affecting the transfer of loans.
